Package fko.breakout.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    Ball Represents a Ball for the game.
    BallManager
    Manages 0 to n balls.
    BreakOutGame
    BreakOutModel Handles the BreakOut game status, the main game loop and calculations.
    Brick
    Brick A Brick has a certain BrickType and a BrickPower which can be BrickPower.NONE.
    BrickLayout
    BrickLayout A BrickLayout holds a 18x13 matrix of Bricks.
    LevelLoader
    LevelLoader Loads levels from level text files.
    SoundManager
    Sounds Loads all sounds and maps them to an enumeration for easy access.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BrickPowerType
    BrickPowerType 04.01.2018
    BrickType
    BrickType 04.01.2018
    SoundManager.Clips
    All available audio clips of this class
